direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle PTCP options, with getPTCPOption retrieving and setPTCPOption setting the options.
Both methods involve retrieving options, though getPTCPOption handles PTCP-specific options and getOption handles generic socket options.
Both methods involve setting options, though setPTCPOption handles PTCP-specific options and setOption handles generic socket options.
Both methods access and return configuration settings related to the socket's operational parameters.
Both methods modify configuration settings related to the socket's operational parameters.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of a parser or configuration before they can operate.
Environment setup is required before accessing or modifying PTCP options.
Both methods verify formats and handle similar exceptions related to configuration settings.
